module.name: Spin
module.short: This unit contains classes for spin edit controls.

descr.p: spin.pp contains classes which implement spin edit controls. This file is part of the Lazarus Component Library (LCL).
The following components are added to the Lazarus IDE component palette:
Misc Tab
Original author: Shane Miller.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit
element.short: The base class for the float-based spin control.

descr.p: TCustomFloatSpinEdit is a TCustomEdit descendant which implements the base class for the float-based spin edit control. It provides an edit control where the Float value can be entered directly, and up / down buttons which can be used to increment or decrement the value for the control.
Use the MinValue and MaxValue properties to define the lower and upper limits for the value in the control.
Use the Increment property to set the value added to or subtracted from the control value when the up or down buttons are clicked.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.DefIncrement
element.short: Default increment for the control.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.DefDecimals
element.short: Default decimal places displayed for the control.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.DefMaxValue
element.short: Default value for the MaxValue property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.FIncrement
element.short: Stores the increment for the control.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.FDecimals
element.short: Stores the decimal places displayed for the control.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.FEditorEnabled
element.short: Stores the value for the EditorEnabled property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.FMaxValue
element.short: Stores the value for the MaxValue property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.FMinValue
element.short: Stores the value for the MinValue property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.FValue
element.short: Stores the value for the Value property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.FValueEmpty
element.short: Stores the value for the ValueEmpty property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.FUpdatePending
element.short: Internal flag used in the control.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.FValueChanged
element.short: Internal flag used in the control.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.GetValue
element.short: Gets the value for the Value property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.GetValue.Result
element.short: Value for the property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.SetEditorEnabled
element.short: Sets the value for the EditorEnabled property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.SetEditorEnabled.AValue
element.short: New value for the property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.UpdateControl
element.short: Normalizes the Value for the control and notifies the widgetset class.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.MaxValueStored
element.short: Implements the storage specifier for the MaxValue property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.MaxValueStored.Result
element.short: True if an explicit value has been assigned to MaxValue.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.IncrementStored
element.short: Implements the storage specifier for the Increment property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.IncrementStored.Result
element.short: True if an explicit value has been assigned to Increment.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.RealGetText
element.short: Gets the value for the text in the control.

descr.p: RealGetText is an overridden method in TCustomFloatSpinEdit, and calls the inherited method to get the return value when the Handle has been allocated for the control. If the Handle has not been assigned, ValueToStr is called to get the return value for the method.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.TextChanged
element.short: Updates the control state when the value in Text has been changed.

descr.p: TextChanged is an overridden method in TCustomFloatSpinEdit. It ensures that internal flags are updated to track the value and state for the control when it has been changed. It calls the inherited method to validate the content in Text and update the caret position for the control.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.SetDecimals
element.short: Sets the value for the DecimalPlaces property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.SetDecimals.ADecimals
element.short: New value for the DecimalPlaces property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.SetValue
element.short: Sets the value for the Value property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.SetValue.AValue
element.short: New value for the property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.SetMaxValue
element.short: Sets the value for the MaxValue property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.SetMaxValue.AValue
element.short: New value for the property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.SetMinValue
element.short: Sets the value for the MinValue property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.SetMinValue.AValue
element.short: New value for the property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.SetValueEmpty
element.short: Sets the value for the ValueEmpty property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.SetValueEmpty.AValue
element.short: New value for the property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.SetIncrement
element.short: Sets the value for the Increment property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.SetIncrement.AIncrement
element.short: New value for the property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.InitializeWnd
element.short: Creates or re-creates the handle for the windowed control.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.FinalizeWnd
element.short: Frees the handle for the windowed control.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.Loaded
element.short: Performs actions when LCL component streaming is completed.

descr.p: Loaded calls the inherited method on entry to determine the size for the control (and its children) and to apply property values inherited from the parent control (when assigned). Loaded calls UpdateControl when the internal update flag has been set for the control.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.KeyPress
element.short: Handles key press events for the control.

descr.p: KeyPress is an overridden method used to handle key press events for the control. KeyPress calls the inherited method on entry. If the character in Key is not handled in the ancestor class, the argument is examined to determine if it is valid for the control. If Key is not a valid character, it is set to #0 to ignore the key press event.

KeyPress disallows any value in Key that is not a numeric digit, sign character ('+' or '-'), or decimal point character ('.' or ','). The decimal point is automatically converted to the value used in the DefaultFormatSettings variable from the RTL. The decimal point is not allowed when Decimals is set to 0 (zero).

KeyPress does not ensure that the value in Key is valid for a specific position in the control value. It does not guarantee that sign indicators are used only at the start of the control value. Nor does it guarantee that a decimal point character is not used more than once in the entered value. This is implemented in a manner that is Delphi compatible.
Tab (#9), BackSpace (#8), Cut (^X), Paste (^V), Copy (^C), and Undo (^Z) characters are allowed in Key so that they may be applied in inherited methods for the control.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.KeyPress.Key
element.short: Character value for the key press event.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.GetControlClassDefaultSize
element.short: Gets the default size for new instances of the class.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.GetControlClassDefaultSize.Result
element.short: Default size for the new class instance.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Create is the overridden constructor for the class instance, and calls the inherited method on entry. Create sets the style flags needed for the spin edit control, and sets the default values for properties in the class instance. The GetControlClassDefaultSize method is called and the return value is used to set the initial size for the control.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.Create.TheOwner
element.short: Owner of the class instance.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.GetLimitedValue
element.short: Limits the specified value to the minimum and maximum values for the control.

descr.p: The return value contains the value from AValue after it has been limited to the range in the MinValue and MaxValue properties. This action does not occur when MaxValue has the same value as MinValue, or is smaller than MinValue.
descr.remark: Delphi does not constrain the value when MinValue and MaxValue are the same, but does if MaxValue is smaller than MinValue.
descr.p: Called from the UpdateControl, StrToValue, and ValueToStr methods.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.GetLimitedValue.Result
element.short: Value for the control limited to the range in MinValue and MaxValue.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.GetLimitedValue.AValue
element.short: Value examined in the method.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.ValueToStr
element.short: Converts the specified value to a String type using the spin edit settings.

descr.p: Calls GetLimitedValue to range limit the value in AValue. Calls FloatToStrF to format the return value using 20 digits of precision and the number of decimals in the DecimalPlaces property.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.ValueToStr.Result
element.short: String representation for the float value.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.ValueToStr.AValue
element.short: Float value converted to a string in the method.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.StrToValue
element.short: Converts the specified string to a float value according to spin edit settings.

descr.p: Calls StrToFloatF to convert the value in S to a Double data type. If S contains an invalid representation for a float value, Value is used as the return value for the method.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.StrToValue.Result
element.short: Float value for the specified string.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.StrToValue.S
element.short: String examined and converted to a float value in the method.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.DecimalPlaces
element.short: Number of the decimal places displayed in the spin edit control.

descr.p: DecimalPlaces is used in the ValueToStr method, and determines the decimal precision for the value displayed in the spin edit control.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.EditorEnabled
element.short: Indicates whether the value for the control can be entered directly into its edit box.

descr.p: EditorEnabled is a Boolean property which indicates if the Value for the control can be input directly. When set to True, the edit box is enabled. When set To False, only the up and down arrow buttons can be used to change the Value for the control.
The default value for the property is True. Changing the value for the property causes the widgetset class to be notified when the Handle for the control has been allocated.

EditorEnabled is independent of the settings in the ReadOnly and Enabled properties. When ReadOnly is set to True, the Value for the control cannot be modified using either the edit box or the up / down buttons. When Enabled is set to False, the control cannot be given focus or modified.
descr.remark: Disabling the edit box requires support from the underlying widgetset class. It may not be supported or implemented for all widgetsets / platforms. In the current LCL version, it is implemented for the Windows and Windows CE platforms.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.Increment
element.short: Amount applied to the control value when the up or down arrow button is pushed.

descr.p: The default value for the property is defined in the DefIncrement constant (1). Changing the value for the property causes the UpdateControl method to be called.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.MinValue
element.short: Minimal value allowed for the spin edit control.

descr.p: Minimal value allowed for the spin edit control. Set the MinValue property equal to MaxValue to allow any number to be selected.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.MaxValue
element.short: Maximal value allowed for the spin edit control.

descr.p: Maximal value allowed for the spin edit control. Set the MinValue property equal to MaxValue to allow any number to be selected.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.Value
element.short: The value for the spin edit control.

descr.p: Value is a Double property which contains the value for the spin edit control. Value is synchronized to the value in the widgetset class when its Handle has been assigned. Otherwise, the value in the member variable is used for the property value.

Changing the value for the property causes the UpdateControl method to be called. If the Handle for the widgetset class has been assigned, the new value is posted to the widgetset class by calling the Change method.
Value is affected by the range limits defined in the MinValue and MaxValue properties.

element.name: TCustomFloatSpinEdit.ValueEmpty
element.short: Indicates if a value has not been assigned for the control.
element.descr: ValueEmpty is updated in the TextChanged method when a new value has been assigned to the control. Changing the value for the property causes the UpdateControl method to be called.

element.name: TFloatSpinEdit
element.short: Implements a float-based spin edit control.

descr.p: TFloatSpinEdit is a TCustomFloatSpinEdit descendant which implements a spin edit control for a Float value. It provides an edit control for the numeric value and up / down buttons that can be clicked to increment or decrement the Value for the control. TFloatSpinEdit sets the visibility for properties introduced in ancestor classes.
Use TSpinEdit to edit an Integer value.

element.name: TFloatSpinEdit.AutoSelected
element.short: Indicates whether the selected content in the control has been automatically selected.

descr.p: AutoSelected is updated in methods which handle focus change actions for the control, including: MouseDown, MouseUp, DoEnter, and DoExit. In general, it indicates when the Text and SelText properties have the same value.

The visibility for the property is public, and does not appear in the Object Inspector at design-time. It is, however, available in code at run-time. It is not declared as a read-only property, but there is no obvious reason to assign a value that does not result from calling the SelectAll method.
Use AutoSelect to control whether auto-selection is enabled for the control.

element.name: TFloatSpinEdit.OnChange
element.short: The OnChange event is fired when spin edit value has changed.

descr.p: OnChange event is similar to TCustomEdit.OnChange, and is signalled for changes made by the user and for changes made in code. A change is a modification which will cause the text displayed on the screen by the control to be altered. This corresponds to a change in the Value property for the control. The event is called after the change takes place, so Value will already have the new property value.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit
element.short: The base class for an integer-based spin edit control.

descr.p: TCustomSpinEdit is a TCustomFloatSpinEdit descendant which implements a control used to edit, increment, and decrement an Integer value. It has arrow buttons to allow the user to increment / decrement the value and an edit box used to enter a value directly.
Properties like Value, MinValue, MaxValue, and Increment are re-declared as an Integer type. It provides overridden or overloaded methods which use the Integer values needed for the implementation.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.GetIncrement
element.short: Gets the value for the Increment property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.GetIncrement.Result
element.short: Value for the property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.GetMaxValue
element.short: Gets the value for the MaxValue property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.GetMaxValue.Result
element.short: Value for the property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.GetMinValue
element.short: Gets the value for the MinValue property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.GetMinValue.Result
element.short: Value for the property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.GetValue
element.short: Gets the value for the Value property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.GetValue.Result
element.short: Value for the property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.SetIncrement
element.short: Sets the value for the Increment property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.SetIncrement.AValue
element.short: New value for the property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.SetMaxValue
element.short: Sets the value for the MaxValue property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.SetMaxValue.AValue
element.short: New value for the property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.SetMinValue
element.short: Sets the value for the MinValue property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.SetMinValue.AValue
element.short: New value for the property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.SetValue
element.short: Sets the value for the Value property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.SetValue.AValue
element.short: New value for the property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Create is the overridden constructor for the class instance, and calls the inherited constructor on entry. Create ensures that DecimalPlaces is set to 0 (zero) for the Integer type used in the Value property.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.Create.TheOwner
element.short: Owner of the class instance.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.GetLimitedValue
element.short: Gets the value for the control limited the range in MinValue and MaxValue.

descr.remark: GetLimitedValue is implemented to return a Double value. This remains because the method is called from widgetset classes for both TFloatSpinEdit and TSpinEdit, and the method signature cannot be changed to use the Integer type desired for the implementation.
descr.p: Calls the inherited method on entry. GetLimitedValue also ensures that the return value is valid for the MinInt and MaxInt constants defined in RTL for the platform / CPU architecture.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.GetLimitedValue.Result
element.short: Range-limited value for the control.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.GetLimitedValue.AValue
element.short: Value normalized to the range in MinValue and MaxValue.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.Value
element.short: The value for the spin edit control.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.MinValue
element.short: Minimal value allowed for the spin edit control.

descr.p: Minimal value allowed for the spin edit. Set the MinValue property equal to MaxValue to allow any number to be selected.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.MaxValue
element.short: Maximal value allowed for the spin edit control.

descr.p: Maximal value allowed for the spin edit. Set the MinValue property equal to MaxValue to allow any number to be selected.

element.name: TCustomSpinEdit.Increment
element.short: The value by which the value of the control should be increased/decreased when the user clicks one of the arrows or one of the keyboard up/down arrows.

element.name: TSpinEdit
element.short: Implements an integer-based spin edit control.

descr.p: TSpinEdit is a TCustomSpinEdit descendant which implements an integer-based spin edit control. It provides an edit control where the Integer value can be entered directly, and has arrow buttons to allow the user to increment / decrement the value for the control.
TSpinEdit sets the visibility for properties introduced in ancestor classes.
Use TFloatSpinEdit to edit a float value in a spin edit control.

element.name: TSpinEdit.OnChange
element.short: The OnChange event is fired when the spin edit value has changed.

descr.p: This OnChange event is based on TCustomEdit.OnChange, so it is fired both on changes made by the user and also for changes made by code. A change is defined as a modification which will cause the text displayed on the screen by the control to change. This corresponds to a change in the property Value in the control. The event is called after the change takes place, so the Value property will contain the new value.

element.name: Register
element.short: Registers components for use in the Lazarus IDE.

descr.p: The following components are added to the Lazarus IDE component palette:
Misc Tab
